tool_description: Monitors current stock levels across all inventory items, tracking quantities, locations, and status for restaurant ingredients and supplies.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the storage location (e.g., main_kitchen, freezer_1, dry_storage)

error_messages: Invalid location ID: The specified location_id does not exist in the system. Verify the location identifier.
Empty inventory data: No inventory records found for the specified location. Check if location is properly set up.
Invalid category filter: One or more categories in the filter are not recognized. Use valid categories like 'produce', 'dairy', 'meat', 'dry_goods'.
usage: Specify the location_id to get current inventory levels. Optionally filter by category_filter array to focus on specific inventory types. Returns detailed stock information for all tracked items.

current_quantities.description: Current stock quantities for each item

units.description: Measurement units for each quantity (lbs, gallons, cases, etc.)
